items.content_html: MaxiEditor is a free, open source, lightweight, customizable rich text editor designed for easy integration with web projects. It offers essential text editing features with a flexible toolbar, user-configurable size, and plugin architecture for extended functionality.
items.title: Williamug/maxi-editor: MaxiEditor is a free, open source, lightweight, customizable rich text editor designed for easy integration with web projects. It offers essential text editing features with a flexible toolbar, user-configurable size, and plugin architecture for extended functionality.

items.title: akiraohgaki/devsrv: A lightweight development web server.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.  Zero dependencies.

items.content_html: Depined is a dependency injection tool for JavaScript and TypeScript. It is a lightweight solution with full typing support.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
